articles.author: Monica Grady, Hannah Cloke, Helen Czerski
articles.title: The 10 biggest science stories of 2022 – chosen by scientists - The Guardian
articles.description: From moon missions to fast-charging batteries and AI-sourced antibiotics, in no particular order, the year’s significant scientific developments
articles.content:
1. The Dart and Orion missions
The year opened with a bang. Or rather, it didnt. The successful film Dont Look Up, in which a comet is found to be on a collision course with Earth, had been released… [+19317 chars]

articles.author: Nicola Davis
articles.title: Teeth suggest ancestors of diplodocus may have eaten meat - The Guardian
articles.description: Analysis shows ‘earliest members of two main veggie dinosaur lineages were not exclusively herbivorous’
articles.content:
With its huge feet, long neck and penchant for plants, the diplodocus may be one of historys biggest vegetarians. But research has revealed the sauropods ancestors may have had a taste for flesh.
Sc… [+3601 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Soyuz temperature rising but crew not in danger, says Russian space agency - The Guardian
articles.description: Coolant leak on Soyuz capsule forced last-minute cancellation of spacewalk by two cosmonauts
articles.content:
The temperature in the Soyuz capsule, which is docked with the International Space Station, has risen but the crew is not in danger, the Russian space agency has said.
On Thursday, Roscosmos and the… [+907 chars]
